view_definition_query: select interventions.id as interventionid, interventions.solution, interventions.comment, interventions.timestamp, interventions.duration, interventions.status as istatus, alarms.status as astatus, alarms.company, machines.name as mname, failuretypes.name as ftname, alarmtypes.code, alarmtypes.name as atname from failuremanager.interventions as interventions left join failuremanager.alarms as alarms on interventions.idAlarm = alarms.id left join failuremanager.machines as machines on alarms.idMachine = machines.id left join failuremanager.alarmtypes as alarmtypes on alarms.idAlarmType = alarmtypes.code left join failuremanager.failuretypes as failuretypes on alarms.idFailureType = failuretypes.id
